description: The Swix Tista Beanie is a soft and cozy winter hat that is made of a special yarn that has natural properties to keep you warm, dry, and fresh. The yarn is derived from coconut husk-charcoal, which enhances the fabric’s resistance to moisture, odour control, and UV protection. The beanie has a snug fit on the forehead and a spandex content that makes it stretchable.
name: Swix Tista Beanie - Unisex
